What is the purpose of the operator \( G \) in the equation \( \hat{z}_{k+1} \leftarrow \argmin_z g(z) \)?A. To minimize the function \( g(z) \) with respect to \( z \)

C. To generate the next iterate \( x_{k+1} \) directly

The notation \( \hat{z}_{k+1} \leftarrow \argmin_z g(z) \) indicates that \( \hat{z}_{k+1} \) is chosen to be the argument that minimizes \( g(z) \), thus the purpose of \( G \) is related to the minimization process.
Answer with the option's letter from the given choices directly.
